ProcessTemplates.Name: Json file from SFTP server to MySQL Database UPDATE
ProcessTemplates.Description:
This process will retrieve a **Json file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MySQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MySQL Database**.

Process.Name: Json file from SFTP server to MySQL Database UPDATE
Process.Description:
This process will retrieve a **Json file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MySQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MySQL Database**.
